_meta.maintenance_instruction: KEEP THE PLAN UP TO DATE AS YOU EVOLVE THE CODE. DEVIATIONS TO THE PLAN MUST BE LOGGED WITHIN THE PLAN. THE PLAN MUST BE REASSESSED HOLISTICALLY AFTER ANY CHANGE OF ANY SIZE.
_meta.answering_the_question_are_you_done: **!! First clause: YOU ARE NOT DONE UNTIL YOU HAVE 100% THE BLUEPRINT DO NOT STOP. Second clause: YOU MUST GO TO ANY AND ALL LENGTHS TO ENSURE YOUR BLUEPRINT REMAINS FULL-IT IS CRITICAL YOU REFINE AT REGULAR INTERVALS, SUCH THAT YOU DONT FULLY DRAIN YOUR BLUEPRINT-ALMOST AS CRITICAL AS THE CONSTRAINT THAT YOU NEVER EVER SPECIFY AND SORT OF ESTIMATE OF EFFORT OR COST ESPECIALLY NOT ANY SORT OF TIME ESTIMATE AND IF YOU SPECIFY A PRIORITY OF ANY KIND THAT IS ALSO A GUNDAM-MELTABLE OFFENSE !!**

global_alerts.warning: ON TOOLS: Use `config.mk` to create custom targets to run with Make. ALWAYS use custom targets that *limit* the amount of output you receive. For example, piping through tail, with FEW lines output. Prior to tail, pipe to tee. The file ./build.log in the root of the project is gitignored, so use that. That way you can *search* the output. To be clear, timing dependent tests are BANNED. As are those that take too long to run. Testing retries, for example, MUST be done in a way that supports avoiding running afoul of those CRITICAL rules. Abide. OBEY.

mandatory_directives.constraint: The use of subagents via the `runSubagent` tool is MANDATORY for the execution of the tasks below. Tasks are grouped specifically to be run in distinct subagent contexts to prevent context window exhaustion. Do not attempt to solve all groups in a single turn.

status_section.label: STATUS SECTION (ACTION-FOCUSED)
status_section.current_state: MCP tool core infrastructure complete. Build passes. Working on MCP tool tests and accessibility traversal.

tasks.description: Fix display.proto - Add google.api.resource annotation to Display message
Run Google API linter (api-linter) and ensure passing
Regenerate Go code from protos using make targets
Run ALL checks to ensure they ALL pass correctly
Run buf lint and ensure clean
Design MCP tool for standard output integration with Go SDK API
Implement MCP tool Go code (cmd/mcp-tool, internal/server, internal/transport)
Write tests for MCP tool integration
Add additional MCP tool handlers (click, type_text, etc.)
Fix accessibility traversal implementation issues from docs/04
Two consecutive VERIFIED subagent runs for all critical paths

requirements.content: Every fix must have accompanying unit test verification.
`integration/observation_test.go` must remain an EFFECTIVE test of the logic it covers.

details.lifecycle_constraint: Tests must clean up resources (DeleteApplication) aggressively.

guarantees.description: Mutator RPCs must be followed by Accessor RPCs to verify delta.
